text: thumb|300px|Map of Inukami District in Shiga Prefecture is a district located in Shiga Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the district has an estimated population of 23,638 and a density of 150.21 persons per km2. The total area is 157.37 km2. ==Towns== *Kōra *Taga *Toyosato ==Transition== thumb|300px|Map of Inukami District with Meiji period (1890) area in yellow, modern area in green.
